definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple
talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple

sentences.english: The daughter of teacher Wang has a lot of talent.
sentences.chinese: 王老师家的女公子是位才女。

sentences.english: Everyone was saying what a handsome couple they made.
sentences.chinese: 大家都说他们是郎才女貌的一对。

sentences.english: Xiao Li was a talented girl, but quite plain-looking.
sentences.chinese: 小丽是个才女，但是相貌平平。

sentences.english: The gold farmland is one Sir, the song red lady calls is an up the then gifted woman.
sentences.chinese: 金田一先生，歌红女士称得上是当时的才女。

sentences.english: But Rihanna is a far more nebulous talent.
sentences.chinese: 但蕾哈娜却是个更随性的才女。

sentences.english: Then I have to play a talented woman in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 那么我一定要演一回古代的才女。

sentences.english: I am no longer surprised at your knowing only six accomplished women.
sentences.chinese: 怪不得你只认识六个才女啦。

sentences.english: Everybody said they were a perfect match and never imagined they would end up getting divorced.
sentences.chinese: 大家都说他们郎才女貌，没想到他们最后离婚了。

sentences.english: During numerous talented women of Ming and Qing dynastic, Wang Duanshu was above the average.
sentences.chinese: 王端淑是明清两代众多才女中的佼佼者。

definition: girl from a wealthy family/unmarried daughter of a noble house
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever

an outstanding talent (idiom)/surpassing insight and acumen
